email_chain.subject: Inquiry: Coal Shipment from Richards Bay to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Lisa,

I hope this message finds you well. We are looking to charter a vessel for a shipment of 50,000MT of coal from Richards Bay to Rotterdam. Could you provide a freight quote and vessel availability for this route?

Best regards,
John Doe
Maritime Trade Services

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Coal Shipment from Richards Bay to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

Thank you for your inquiry. We can offer the vessel MV OCEAN STAR, with a DWT of 75,000 and LOA of 225m, for this shipment. The laycan is from 2023-10-20 to 2023-10-25. Our starting freight quote is USD 25/MT on a CIF basis.

Please let me know if this works for you or if you need further details.

Best regards,
Lisa Smith
Global Charter Services

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Coal Shipment from Richards Bay to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Lisa,

Thank you for the prompt response. The vessel details look good, but the freight rate seems a bit high. Could you consider a rate of USD 22/MT? Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate?

Best regards,
John

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Coal Shipment from Richards Bay to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

We can adjust the freight rate to USD 23/MT, considering the volume of the shipment. The demurrage rate is USD 12,000 per day. Please confirm if this works for you.

Best regards,
Lisa

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Coal Shipment from Richards Bay to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Lisa,

Thank you for the revised quote. We agree to the rate of USD 23/MT and the demurrage rate of USD 12,000 per day. Please proceed with the booking for the laycan of 2023-10-20 to 2023-10-25.

Best regards,
John

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Coal Shipment from Richards Bay to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

Thank you for your confirmation. We have booked the MV OCEAN STAR for your shipment. The laycan is confirmed as 2023-10-20 to 2023-10-25. We will send the charter party agreement shortly.

Best regards,
Lisa
